name: WurdWizard
description:
Your tiny island has been overrun by grammatically challenged monsters and it's up to you to save your island's library from the clutches of an evil wizard!
  • Run, Jump, Smash and Spell your way through a unique and in no way educational adventure!
  • There are 6 stages and 25+ levels with tons of different enemies and friends to meet along the way!
  • Spell words to earn SpellPoints which can be used to buy new weapons, spells and potions.
  • Cast spells to summon companions, control the weather, turn into a snowman, raise the dead  i.e. magical shenanigans!
  • Beat the games's story mode to unlock Endless Island and unlock all 60 achievements!  
  • Purchase includes an Android build to play on the go!

WurdWizard is an endless speller for PC, Mac & Android! 


Credits
